item.title: HiLDA - a statistical approach to investigate differences in mutational signatures
Statistical approach for investigating change in mutational processes during cancer growth and development
Colorectal cancer study
item.description: During my doctoral training, most of my research is focused on developing novel statistical methods for genomics data, specifically, cancer development and tumor growth. This project has enlighted me to work on several interesting perspectives of it, including hierarchical topics model, clustering, and interactive interface. Thanks to my advisors Kimberly Siegmund, and committe member Paul Marjoram and Darryl Shibata.
